member.name: T:RepoDb.Interfaces.ITrace
member.summary: An interface used to mark a class to be usable for tracing operations. A trace object is being used by the repositories on every operations (before or after) the actual execution. It provides the flexibility of the operations to be traceable and debuggable. The caller can modify the SQL Statements or the parameters being passed prior the actual execution, or even cancel the prior-execution.

member.name: M:RepoDb.Extensions.DataEntityExtension.GetPrimaryProperty``1
member.summary: Gets the primary key property of the Data Entity object. The identification of the primary key will be based on the availability of certain attributes and naming convention. The identification process: 1. Checks the RepoDb.Attributes.PrimaryKeyAttribute. 2. If #1 is not present, then it checks the name of the property must be equal to Id. 3. If #2 is not present, then it checks the type name of the class appended by the word Id. 4. If #3 is not present, then it checks the mapped name of the class appended by the word Id
member.typeparam: The type of the data entity where to get the primary key property.
member.returns: An instance of System.Reflection.PropertyInfo that corresponds to as a primary property of the data entity.
